data.title: Jan Hoffmann - Men's Track & Field
data.meta_description: Jan HoffmannDistance  - 2017 Outdoors: Placed ninth in the 800 meters (1:58.02) at the Monmouth Season Opener on March 24…Ran the 1500 meters in 4:01.97 at the Colonial
data.text:
2017 Outdoors: Placed ninth in the 800 meters (1:58.02) at the Monmouth Season Opener on March 24…Ran the 1500 meters in 4:01.97 at the Colonial Relays on March 30.

2016-17 Indoors: Took second in the 1000 meters (2:32.80) at the Seahawk Shootout on Dec. 9…Recorded a time of 2:38.71 in the 1000 at the Metropolitan Indoor Championships on Feb. 2.

2016 Cross Country: Finished 10th overall at the Metropolitan Championships on Oct. 7, completing the 8000-meter course in 26:49.30…Notched a season-best 8000-meter time of 25:34.60 to secure eighth place overall at the UAlbany Invitational on Oct. 15…Posted a time of 25:55.49 for 8000 meters, which was good for 30th place at the MAAC Championships on Oct. 29…Led the Jaspers in the university race at the IC4A Championships on Nov. 19, running 8000 meters in 26:03.00 to place seventh overall.

Before Manhattan: Spent one year at Eberhard-Karls-University of Tuebingen in Germany…Previously attended Carlo-Schmid-Gymnasium…Participated in track & field for six years with LAV Stadtwerke Tubingen…A three-time recipient of the Silver Medal of Sports Honor of Tubingen (2014, 2015, 2016).

Personal: Son of Dirk and Heike…Has three sisters: Anke, Marit and Bentje…Majoring in management with aspirations for a career in global business…Born on April 25, 1996.
